column2: gal te dbang bskur de 'dzin na // tshangs spyod dka' thub la gnas pas // bkag pa spyad par 'gyur ba'i phyir //

column1: nizidDa AcaraNa tvAt tad tapaH samvara kzayaH
column2: dka' thub sdom pa de nyams te // brtul zhugs can de pham pa yi //

column1: jAyante vratinaH tasya pArAjika vipattayaH
column2: ltung ba dag ni 'byung 'gyur zhing //

column1: saH patet durgatO nUnam sidDiH na eva kadAcana
column2: de ni ngan song nges lhung bas // grub pa yang ni yod ma yin //

column1: sarva tantra SrutO BAzye homa yajQa Adi karmAsu
column2: rgyud kun nyan dang 'chad pa dang // sbyin sreg mchod sbyin sogs byed pa //

column1: labDa AcArya aBizekaH ca tattva vida na eva duzyati
column2: slob dpon dbang bskur rnyed 'gyur zhing // de nyid rig la nyes pa med // gnas brtan mar me mdzad dpal gyis ; / mdo sogs chos las bshad mthong ba // byang chub 'od kyis gsol btab nas //

column1: dIpaFkara SriyA boDi paTaH proktaH samAsatas
column2: byang chub lam bshad mdor bsdus byas // byang chub lam gyi sgron ma slob dpon chen po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
/// rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po de nyid dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba dge ba'i blo gros kyis bsgyur zhing gtan la phab pa /
